data.text: @hkfp Is anyone really surprised by this devt?
@hkfp This picture speaks volumes, like the western media only caring about white refugees. Good riddance, another milestone in decolonization, 24 years too late
@hkfp did she @AOC ever tell you about the camera feed she had to my jail cell? True story
@hkfp If you're leaving #HongKong to #Europe on this moment, perfect timing https://t.co/8RKwvxBP5b

@hkfp It's interesting your photographer took a photo of my friend with his wife and daughter.
They aren't fleeing Hong Kong, they're coming back to the UK visiting family who they've not seen in three years and are returning back to HK in a few weeks, they love HK
@WhatWopokah721 @hkfp Youâ€™re too lazy to apply to the wumao fund to get a profile photo and some bot followers?

@mdthib @hkfp Actually, I think the majority of people leaving HK are going to mainland China,  Shenzhen and Zhuhai have around 2000 isolation hotel quotas, and every day there are 5 more flights from HK to mainland China flight which are all full....
